title: WoollimPICK
overview: Woollim Entertainment's new 11-member boy group Golden Child will be greeting fans with their first reality show, in sync with their debut.Golden Child, consisting of Joo Chan, Tag, Dong Hyun, Dae Yul, Jang Jun, Jae Suk, Y, Jae Hyun, Ji Bum, Bo Min, and Seung Min, will be proving that they have what it takes to be an idol boy group through this show, which will be carried out like the Olympics.
